rules: Replace 'health program/journey' or 'specifically formulated products' with 'proprietary blends'.
Cap discounts at 15%, offered only to seniors, veterans, or after two haggles.
Spend 6–10 minutes on value building before pricing.
Ask 4–10 qualifying health questions per call.
Mandatory phrases: 'You are going to love it.', 'This product is wonderful.', 'I can’t wait for you to try this.', 'I take it every day.'
